meanings.definition: More pleasing to the taste or smell than something else.
meanings.sent1: The chocolate cake was yummier than the plain bread.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream was yummier than the frozen peas.
meanings.sent3: The yummier cupcake winked at the boring muffin.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was yummier than a melody to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh cookies filled the room, making it yummier than ever.

meanings.definition: More attractive or desirable in a delicious way.
meanings.sent1: The colorful candy looked yummier than the dull vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The juicy burger seemed yummier than the plain sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The yummier dessert danced on the plate, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was yummier than a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in yummier shades of orange and pink.
